# f5xc_app_firewall (Data Source)

Fetches information about an existing App Firewall in F5 Distributed Cloud.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the App Firewall to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the App Firewall exists.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the App Firewall.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier for the App Firewall.
- `labels` (Map of String) Labels applied to the App Firewall.
